titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Mary-le-Bow, before the Lord Mayor, Court of Aldermen and citizens of London on Wednesday, the 16th of September, a day appointed by Their Majesties for a solemn monthly fast / by Lilly Butler, Rector of Bubbingworth in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Butler, Lilly.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
